Class playn.core.TextFormat

Added Constructors
TextFormat(Font, boolean) Creates a configured text format instance.
TextFormat(Font, float, Alignment, boolean) @deprecated {@code wrapWidth} and {@code align} are no longer supported.
 

Changed Constructors
TextFormat(Font, float, Alignment) Now deprecated.
 Use {@link TextFormat()} and configuration methods.
 

Added Methods
TextFormat withAntialias(boolean) Returns a clone of this text format with .antialias configured as specified.
 

Changed Methods
TextFormat withAlignment(Alignment) Now deprecated.
 Use {@link Graphics#layoutText(String,TextFormat,float)} and render the wrapped lines individually (aligning them as desired).
TextFormat withWrapWidth(float) Now deprecated.
 Use {@link Graphics#layoutText(String,TextFormat,float)} and render the wrapped lines individually.
TextFormat withWrapping(float, Alignment) Now deprecated.
 Use {@link Graphics#layoutText(String,TextFormat,float)} and render the wrapped lines individually.
 

Added Fields
boolean antialias Whether or not the text should be antialiased.
